channel.title: Art on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE
channel.description: Recent content in Art on INSCRIPTION AT SALONAE

item.title: Mediocrity: a response
item.description: This post arrived in my inbox just a few moments ago and I just had to write down my thoughts. You can read the full post yourself but I wanted to make a few points, mainly to help myself grab hold of some thoughts that have been squirming at the back of my head for a few months, perhaps even a few years, now. I’ll open this by saying that I’m not an artist.
